extendedInfo.description: Tax Calculator is a fully featured calculator which provides calculation in the area of Taxation . Calculate various properties of Tax related values using this simple utility tool. Tax Calculator includes the following features:1)	Income Tax Calculator  a)	China  b)	Australian Income  c)	France  d)	India  e)	UK Income  f)	US Income  g)	Malaysia  h)	Turkey  i)	Philippines  j)	Japan  k)	Italy  l)	Germany  m)	Newzealand2)	Other Tax Calculators  a)	Medicare Tax  b)	Sales Tax

reviews.comment: Big Fail, plenty of cheesy ads
reviews.author: Nuno Brito
